channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Mime Types Extended
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Mime Types Extended

item.title: CVE-2024-4759|2024-06-25T06:00:03.188Z -- unknown -- mime%20types%20extended
item.description: The Mime Types Extended WordPress plugin through 0.11 does not sanitise uploaded SVG files, which could allow users with a role as low as Author to upload a malicious SVG containing XSS payloads.
